name: Aperol Spritz Animation (Figma Freebie)
description:
Hey designers! 🍹🧊🍊

 It’s getting warm here in Poland, so let’s leave our beautiful designs for a sec and see how to make some tasty drinks for summer evenings.


  Thank you cookieandkate.com for the recipe

and Su.designex for beautiful abstract backgrounds. 


Feel free to see how it’s made ✶


⚡As always, we’re available for new challenges!

www.uigstudio.com
